sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: This is the gr-digital package. It contains all of the digital modulation blocks, utilities, and examples. To use the digital blocks, the Python namespaces is in gnuradio.digital, which would be normally imported as:
See the Doxygen documentation for details about the blocks available in this package. The relevant blocks are listed in the Digital Modulation Blocks group.
A quick listing of the details can be found in Python after importing by using:
